title: PEPPER CHICKEN WITH CARAMELIZED ONIONPrint recipe
directions: Heat one tbsp olive oil. Add 1/3 sliced onion and saute about 4 minutes till dark brown. Add ginger, garlic and saute 2 minutes
Add chicken chunks and the steak seasoning and cook uncovered about 30 minutes till it dries up.
Meanwhile heat 1 tbsp olive oil. Add remaining onion and cook till it get soft brown and caramelized.
Add 1 tsp fresh pepper, paprika, salt to the chicken mixture and cook another 2 minutes. Add chopped celery leaves and caramelized onion and simmer for 2 minutes.
Serve hot with rice or in lettuce leaves to make a lettuce wrap
